lines.text: [over the chaos of an ambush, van Cleef hears a fuse burning]
GET THE FUCK DOWN!
Randal, Randal, Randal. You were going to leave without saying goodbye, huh?
My momma got sick in Biloxi. I was gonna call you, Mr. Van Cleef...
Of course you were, Randal. Of course you were. I know you didn't mean to... hurt... my feelings.
You are a fucking buffalo!

[after a hunt]
Was it worth it?
Every nickel.
You're not angry at me, are you, Pik?
I don't get angry.
[holds up his shotgun]
I'm a professional.
Randal, I come back here, I cut me a steak.
If you understand me, just grunt.

[Lying face down on a massage table thinking the masseuse is still massaging him, not knowing that Chance is]
Oh yeah baby
Hello Poe!

[Making a startled rise from the table]
What the fuck?

[Slamming Poe's face down into the head rest]
You miss me?
Oh Christ not again!
It looks like you're short an ear, so you better listen very carefully. Now, who sent those apes after me?

[Squirming in pain]
I dont know what you're talking about

[Pushes Poe's head harder into the head rest]
Two million people in this city, who's gonna miss a fat slob like you?
Van Cleef! His name is Van Cleef!
Good boy, where is he?
I dont know where he lives, he ain't even American! Look he'll kill me if I dont do what he says, please...

[Again pushes his head further into the head rest]
You tell your boyfriend Van Cleef that im going to find out who killed Douglas Binder. If you understand me, just grunt
[Grunts hesitantly]
Again
[pushes his head even harder in the head rest]
Ooh-wee! Ha ha! Sometimes I 'maze myself! Good whiskey make jackrabbit slap de bear!
What's your name?
It's Nat.
'Nat?'
Mm-hmm.
Your parents named you for a... bug?
You trust me?
Of course I trust you.
Close your eyes.
Why do you want me to trust you with my eyes closed?
Now take your pig-stick and your boyfriend, and find a bus to catch.
Hey! Help me, man! Come on, man! Help me!
Hey, man! I ain't got no change, man!
[after blasting Stephan]
Sorry about your shirt.
Careless is what you are, Randal. Careless and stupid and now you're sorry, too.

[handing Natasha a flask of his moonshine]
Here, drink. But do not spill. It kill de grass.

[his only line]
The place is clean, he just left.
Do you still have the 30.06... the one I gave you for your birthday?
No... a gator ate it. But I still got your shot-gun.

[after Douvee has been shot in the leg]
Can you get up?
I cannot dance... but, I can get up.
Grab the bar!
Load me!
Boudreaux, Boudreaux, Boudreaux. I've been looking all over for you.
You've been looking in the wrong places.
That's good, cause I know you wouldn't want to hurt my feelings.
[last lines; after Fouchon stabbed Douvee with an arrow]

[shakes him]
Douvee! Douvee!

[opens his eyes]
What is this noise?
[they help him sit up]
I think I hurt pretty bad.
[He takes his flask out of his breast pocket, which has a hole punched in it]
Now this... this real catastrophe! This real bad!
Yeah, real bad.

[Seconds before killing his enemy]
Hunting season... is over.
I'll fuck you, then I'll eat you.

[his last line]
Whoops!
There's always some unhappy corner of the globe where we can ply our trade.

[Fouchon stops Zenan from shooting Roper before the chase can begin]
This is New Orleans... not Beirut!

[after punching a sleeping Poe in the stomach]
Wakey wakey... you fat fuck!
What kind of a name is Chance?
Well... my momma took one...
You see, Miss Binder, you I can understand. It was a matter of family.
[to Boudreaux]
You had *nothing* in common with those people. What made you want to complicate my life like that?
Poor people get bored too.
Ohh!
How's that gumbo, Chance?
A tragedy. The coffee was tolerable, though.
It ain't free, neither.
Yeah. I know.
Leave your wallet in your tuxedo?
I play that one on you before?
Yeah. For the gumbo.
That's right.
[hands her a whole bunch of change]
Well if it ain't my good friend Boudreaux. I thought you was gonna catch a ship.
Maybe I'll stick around to run for mayor.
It appears your trophy is ripping us a new orifice.

Let me review the tactical situation for you, gentlemen. Boudreaux is wounded. He's been pursued and harried across miles of open country. Now he's cornered and outnumbered 20 to 1. He's an annoying little fucking insect and I want him stepped on hard.
Chance! What brings you here?

[mysteriously]
Secret mission.
Oh...
[she motions him inside, he winks at her]
[first lines]

[trying to open a locked door]
Please...
